description: Increases all party members' max HP by 30%, lasting for 30m. (This effect only applies to your own Resonator(s) in Co-op Mode)
bgDescription: Also known as "Winter Cloud Soup‚Äù. A luxury congee made by slow-cooking Caltrop with poultry broth. The key to make this dish is the control of the heat and the ratio of the ingredients. The slow cooking with a gentle heat preserves the original sweetness of the Caltrop. Paired with Honeysuckle, even a lonely night will feel happy.
